IS590DVO - Data Visualization

This is the course website for IS590 Data Visualization in Spring 2019 (Online)

  • View On GitHub

Week 5 - Types of Viz and Choosing Colors

This week, we covered how colors work, how transformations work, and how we can choose colors and transforms to better suit our data.

Datasets

  • Michigan Depth Map (86Mb)
  • Brain Scan (72Mb)
  • Image Example
  • Affline Transformations on Images - save to notebook folder (or modify your path)
  • Palette Colors - save to notebook folder (or modify your path)

Extra links

  • Why Jet is a bad color map (and what to consider when choosing a colormap)
  • Mapping Disney Movie Frames to Color over time
